hanzi-su-wiki:
協

Значения

Соединять, согласовывать, сотрудничать; слаженно

Мнемоника

Десять 十 человек, работающих с утроенной силой 力.

Варианты

协, 恊, 叶
purpleculture_pinyin:
xié
to cooperate; to harmonize; to help; to assist; to join
кооперироваться; гармонизировать; помочь; помогать; присоединиться
rtega_mnemonic:
協協RS
协协		be united, cooperate, cooperation
  • thirty arms 十劦 working together/manage 办 something with ten 十 people working together
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 协)
Pictophonetic: 十 indicates the sound; 劦 (cooperate) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
協調 [ xié tiáo ]: to coordinate; to harmonize; to fit together; to match (colors etc); harmonious; concerted
協議 [ xié yì ]: agreement; pact; protocol; Classifiers: 项
協會 [ xié huì ]: an association; a society; Classifiers: 个
協商 [ xié shāng ]: to consult with; to talk things over; agreement
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 十 [ shí ] ten, tenth; complete; perfect
    • 劦 [ xié ] to cooperate, to work together; joint labor
heisig_chinese_memo: The nurse says : “If you cooperate, that needle (syringe) in your triceps won't hurt”.
heisig_constituent: co-, ten, needle, triceps, power, muscle, arnold, power3, muscle3, arnold3
heisig_story: This prefix should be kept distinct from inter (Frame 222) and mutual (Frame 819). Its elements: needle . . . triceps.
koohiiStory1: The nurse says : “If you co-operate, that needle (syringe) in your triceps won´t hurt”. Note: both co- and cooperate are meanings for this kanji.
koohiiStory2: Co-operation: 3 persons can have the power of ten if they co-operate.
jp_example_words:
協会(きょうかい): association, society, organization
協議(きょうぎ): conference, consultation, discussion, negotiation
協調(きょうちょう): co-operation, conciliation, harmony, firm (market) tone
協定(きょうてい): arrangement, pact, agreement
妥協(だきょう): compromise, giving in
協力(きょうりょく): cooperation, collaboration
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Next to the cross we combine our power power power so that we have cooperation. And with our powers combined, we become stronger than we ever could have been apart, lifting the cross above our heads!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: The power of cooperation is a *ahem* powerful thing.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Nowhere is the power of cooperation more apparent than in きょうと. When invaders are attacking, when the townspeople want to rebel, when there is a kitty up a tree, the people combine their power from all reaches of Japan and cross into きょうと to put a stop to the madness through cooperation.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine being a citizen of きょうと. Watch as the powers from your neighboring prefectures march across the border to come cooperate together to stop the bandits that raided your farm. You admire their cooperation. You admire きょうと!
Ru_Notes: Фонетик: 劦 (キョウ много силы, сотрудничество), сам по себе не используется.
Ru_trainchinese: xié: (графема) помогать, содействовать; сотрудничать; гармоничный
Kanshudo_mnemonic: if you had ten (十) lots of 3x the effort (劦) you'd get cooperation
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The police threaten to give you pins and needles so you get nervous, start sweating and cooperate.
humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle from two " Lei " to two " dogs ", or from two " Lei " to one " dog ", inscriptions from two " Lei " to three " dogs ", and the Warring States bamboo slips from three " Lei " to three " dogs ". " Lei " is like an ancient wooden tillage tool that can be stepped on. " Dog " is shaped like a dog. The whole word means that a few people use Lei to plow the soil, the dog is guarding it, and the people are united and cooperative. The original meaning is harmony, cooperation and concerted efforts. "Shuowen": "Xie, the people of the same and also. From the 劦 from the ten. Bei, the ancient literature association, from the yue, ten. Ye, or from the mouth." Duan Yucai changed to "the same and the same", note cloud : "The harmony of the same people. One is like force." The variants of " Xie " are also called "旪" and " Ye ". Xu Kai believes that " ten " is a sound symbol. " Xie " is originally from the three " Lei ", because " li " is also like a farm tool with a pedal, so " Lei " and " li " can be used as meaning symbols. Oracle has seen "劦" from " force ", see "劦".

The ancient Chinese character " Xie " was first released by the people of Song Dynasty, and Yu Shengwu demonstrated the shape of the font in detail, which made this theory valid. Yu Xingwu also mentioned the farming in his hometown. Dogs often follow him, lying on the corner of Qiantou Mojia (the corner of the field), and there are still ancient traditions.

The original meaning of " Xie " is to work together, which means harmony and mutual aid. In addition to expressing the general meaning of harmony, " Xie " emphasizes the harmony between people and oneself, action and heart, the so-called thinking in one place and acting in one place. Southern Chen Xu Ling <A to Zhen Yang Hou Wang Taiyu book>: "work together grams Sadakuni home" later " Association " means " and " such as "co-wind" that is, the gentle wind, Li Xueqin think are the four spirits of Dongfeng. "Mandarin. Zhou Yushang: "On the first five days, the wind will come to the notice." Wei Zhao's note: "Xie, he also, the atmosphere is harmonious, and the time is coming."

Oracle uses [劦口] to mean " Xie ", "Compilation" 29004: "叀懋(茂)田[劦口] (Association)", " Mao " under the guise of lush " mao " means that it is overgrown with grass Plowing on the wasteland (see Qiu Xigui). Jia Jinwen is also used as a place name.

Bronze inscription means concord and coordinator, and Qin Gongping: "Consolidate our country or (country) by Kang," which means coordinating and coordinating my country by stability. Qin Gongzhong: "Xiehe Wanmin". "book. "Yao Dian": "People Zhaoming, Xiehe Wanbang." 𤼈Zhong: "Xiehe Bell" is the bell of music and harmony. The bamboo slips of the Warring States period express harmony and cooperation. "Rui Liangfu" Jane 13: "Using Xiebao, you can't (have) complaints (lawsuits)." It means to cooperate in harmony, (mutually) protect, without resentment and disputes. "Tsinghua Jane One. "Yin Gao" Jane 2: "I can help my friends", which means that I live in harmony with my friends.
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle starts with two " Lei " and two " dogs ", Bronze inscriptions starts with two " Lei " and three " dogs ", and the bamboo slips of the Warring States period from three " Lei " and three " dogs ". " Lei " is like a farm tool used to turn the soil. " Dog " is shaped like a dog. The whole word means that a few people use Lei to plow the soil, the dog is guarding it, and the people are united and cooperative. The original meaning is harmony, cooperation and concerted efforts.
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文從二「耒」二「犬」，或從二「耒」一「犬」，金文從二「耒」三「犬」，戰國竹簡從三「耒」三「犬」。「耒」象古代一種可以腳踏的木製翻土農具。「犬」象狗形。全字表示數人拿耒翻土耕作，狗隻在旁看守，會眾人同心，和睦合作之意。本義是和睦合作、同心合力。《說文》：「協，眾之同和也。从劦从十。旪，古文協，从曰、十。叶，或从口。」段玉裁改為「同眾之龢也」，注云：「同衆之和。一如同力。」「協」的異體又作「旪」、「叶」，徐鍇認為「十」是聲符。「協」本從三「耒」，因為「力」也象用腳踏的農具，所以「耒」、「力」作為意符，可以通用。甲骨文已見從「力」的「劦」，參見「劦」。

　　古文字「協」字最早由宋人釋出，于省吾詳細論證字形，使此說成立。于省吾還提及他家鄉的農耕，狗也往往隨從，臥於阡頭陌角（即田界的角落），仍存古代遺風。

　　「協」的本義是同心合力，有和洽共濟之意。「協」除了表示一般的和諧義外，強調眾人與一己、行動與內心的和諧一致，所謂心往一處想，力往一處使。南朝陳徐陵〈為貞陽侯答王太尉書〉：「同心協力，克定邦家。」後來「協」表示「和」，如「協風」即溫和的風，李學勤認為是四風中的東風。《國語．周語上》：「先時五日，瞽告有協風至。」韋昭注：「協，和也，風氣和，時候至也。」

　　甲骨文用[劦口]來表示「協」，《合集》29004：「叀懋（茂）田[劦口]（協）」，「懋」假借為茂盛的「茂」，意謂在長滿草的荒地上翻土耕作（參裘錫圭）。甲金文又用作地名。

　　金文表示協和、協理，秦公鎛：「以康奠協朕或（國）」，意謂以安定協理、協和我的國家。秦公鐘：「協龢萬民」。《書．堯典》：「百姓昭明，協和萬邦。」𤼈鐘：「協龢鐘」即樂音和協之鐘。戰國竹簡表示和睦、合作，《清華簡三．芮良夫毖》簡13：「用協保，罔又（有）怨誦（訟）。」意謂以和睦合作，（互相）保護，沒有怨恨爭訟。《清華簡一．尹誥》簡2：「我克協我友」，意謂我和我的朋友和睦共處。
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文從二「耒」二「犬」，金文從二「耒」三「犬」，戰國竹簡從三「耒」三「犬」。「耒」象用來翻土的農具。「犬」象狗形。全字表示數人拿耒翻土耕作，狗隻在旁看守，會眾人同心，和睦合作之意。本義是和睦合作、同心合力。
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
協 (Simplified: 协)
Pinyin: xié
English Definition: to cooperate; to harmonize; to help; to assist; to join
Total strokes: 8; Radical: 十
Pictophonetic: 十 indicates the sound; 劦 (cooperate) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 十 [ shí ] ten, tenth; complete; perfect
    • 劦 [ xié ] to cooperate, to work together; joint labor
Example Words:
協調 [ xié tiáo ]: to coordinate; to harmonize; to fit together; to match (colors etc); harmonious; concerted
協議 [ xié yì ]: agreement; pact; protocol; Classifiers: 项
協會 [ xié huì ]: an association; a society; Classifiers: 个
協商 [ xié shāng ]: to consult with; to talk things over; agreement
More: 協* | *協 | *協*

甲骨文從二「 耒 」二「 犬 」，或從二「 耒 」一「 犬 」，金文從二「 耒 」三「 犬 」，戰國竹簡從三「 耒 」三「 犬 」。「 耒 」象古代一種可以腳踏的木製翻土農具。「 犬 」象狗形。全字表示數人拿耒翻土耕作，狗隻在旁看守，會眾人同心，和睦合作之意。本義是和睦合作、同心合力。《說文》：「協，眾之同和也。从劦从十。旪，古文協，从曰、十。叶，或从口。」段玉裁改為「同眾之龢也」，注云：「同衆之和。一如同力。」「 協 」的異體又作「 旪 」、「 叶 」，徐鍇認為「 十 」是聲符。「 協 」本從三「 耒 」，因為「 力 」也象用腳踏的農具，所以「 耒 」、「 力 」作為意符，可以通用。甲骨文已見從「 力 」的「 劦 」，參見「 劦 」。 古文字「 協 」字最早由宋人釋出，于省吾詳細論證字形，使此說成立。于省吾還提及他家鄉的農耕，狗也往往隨從，臥於阡頭陌角（即田界的角落），仍存古代遺風。 「 協 」的本義是同心合力，有和洽共濟之意。「 協 」除了表示一般的和諧義外，強調眾人與一己、行動與內心的和諧一致，所謂心往一處想，力往一處使。南朝陳徐陵〈為貞陽侯答王太尉書〉：「同心協力，克定邦家。」後來「 協 」表示「 和 」，如「協風」即溫和的風，李學勤認為是四風中的東風。《國語．周語上》：「先時五日，瞽告有協風至。」韋昭注：「協，和也，風氣和，時候至也。」 甲骨文用[劦口]來表示「 協 」，《合集》29004：「叀懋（茂）田[劦口]（協）」，「 懋 」假借為茂盛的「 茂 」，意謂在長滿草的荒地上翻土耕作（參裘錫圭）。甲金文又用作地名。 金文表示協和、協理，秦公鎛：「以康奠協朕或（國）」，意謂以安定協理、協和我的國家。秦公鐘：「協龢萬民」。《書．堯典》：「百姓昭明，協和萬邦。」𤼈鐘：「協龢鐘」即樂音和協之鐘。戰國竹簡表示和睦、合作，《清華簡三．芮良夫毖》簡13：「用協保，罔又（有）怨誦（訟）。」意謂以和睦合作，（互相）保護，沒有怨恨爭訟。《清華簡一．尹誥》簡2：「我克協我友」，意謂我和我的朋友和睦共處。

協字的基本解释

協
xié
见“协”。

協字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xié］
［《廣韻》胡頰切，入帖，匣。］
亦作“恊1”。“旪1”的今字。“协1”的繁体字。亦作“叶1”。
(1)和睦；合作。
(2)悦服。
(3)调整；调和。
(4)态度温和。
(5)符合；相同。
(6)汇集；汇合。
(7)合并；搀和。
(8)联合。
(9)协助。
(10)清末新军的编制单位，在镇之下。三营为一标，两标一协。相当于后代的旅。
(11)通“挾”。怀藏。

協字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【十字部】　協； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页156第34
〔古文〕旪【唐韻】【正韻】胡頰切【集韻】【韻會】檄頰切，?音挾。【說文】衆之同和也。从劦，十聲。【書·堯典】協和萬邦。【臯陶謨】同寅協恭。又【爾雅·釋詁】服也。【疏】協者，和合而服也。【書·微子之命】下民祇協。【晉書·虞溥傳】崇尚道素，廣開學業，讚協時雍，光揚盛化。又【集韻】與劦通。【山海經】惟號之山，其風若劦。通作協。又作汁。【周禮註】卿士汁日。【張衡·西京賦】五緯相汁。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xié］
["Guangyun" Hu cheek cut, insert post, box. ]
Also known as "恊1". The present character of "旪1". Traditional characters for "协1". Also known as "Leaf 1".
(1) Harmony; Cooperation.
(2) Yuefu.
(3) Adjustment; reconciliation.
(4) Moderate attitude.
(5) Meet; the same.
(6) Collection; convergence.
(7) Merging; blending.
(8) Union.
(9) Assistance.
(10) The establishment unit of the New Army in the late Qing Dynasty was under the town. Three camps are one standard, two standards and one association. Equivalent to the offspring's brigade.
(11) Through "carrying". Conceal.

Old glyph
Association
Name meaning
Nothing.
xié
be united; cooperate
Radicals: 十, 力  (cross, power)
Meaning Mnemonic
Next to the cross we combine our power power power so that we have cooperation. And with our powers combined, we become stronger than we ever could have been apart, lifting the cross above our heads!
The power of cooperation is a *ahem* powerful thing.
Reading Mnemonic
Nowhere is the power of cooperation more apparent than in きょうと. When invaders are attacking, when the townspeople want to rebel, when there is a kitty up a tree, the people combine their power from all reaches of Japan and cross into きょうと to put a stop to the madness through cooperation.
Imagine being a citizen of きょうと. Watch as the powers from your neighboring prefectures march across the border to come cooperate together to stop the bandits that raided your farm. You admire their cooperation. You admire きょうと!
